channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Check This Out! (CTO!) Guide (September 2025)
item.description:
Member: TysonPaul | Microsoft Community Hub
Selecting the Right Agentic Solution on Azure Team Blog: Azure Architecture Author: pranabpaul Published: 09/16/2025 Summary: The article outlines Azure-specific options for building and deploying agentic solutions, emphasizing the shift from deprecated Assistants API to Azure AI Agent Service within Azure Foundry, which offers robust agent management and ongoing enhancements. Workflow-based projects may use Azure Logic Apps (preview), while advanced scenarios can leverage agent orchestrators like Semantic Kernel or AutoGen for custom architecture...
